title: F35 Mini-Ep 19: Hairy Situations
itunes:title: F35 Mini-Ep 19: Hairy Situations
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree offer advice to a listener who's working through grief after losing their father. Then, they talk about the process of laser hair removal, the potential pros and cons of weekly marriage meetings, and the glory of sometimes ...
description:
Kate and Doree offer advice to a listener who's working through grief after losing their father. Then, they talk about the process of laser hair removal, the potential pros and cons of weekly marriage meetings, and the glory of sometimes eating some butter. Yes, just butter. (It's delicious.)

To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
